plot outline: Ekangi is a psychological thriller which portrays the peace and joy in lonely life. Ravi, an adult who happily lives alone in a big house and always follows his father's last words "Be happy to be alone, Be alone to be happy". One day at a bar, he falls for a beautiful lady and invites her to his house. From that moment, how Ravi's life takes wrong turn forms the rest of the story.
